message.content:
Some possible positions that combine computers and agriculture include:

1. Precision Agriculture Specialist: This role involves using technology such as GPS, sensors, drones, and computer software to optimize crop production and efficiency on farms.

2. Agricultural Data Analyst: In this position, you would use data analysis tools and techniques to analyze farm data collected from various sources and provide actionable insights for farmers.

3. AgTech Engineer: As an agtech engineer, you could design innovative solutions like robotics or automated systems to address agricultural challenges or improve productivity in farming operations.

4. Farm Management Software Developer: You could create specialized software applications tailored specifically for farm management by incorporating the needs of farmers regarding crop planning, livestock tracking, financial management etc.

5.SCADA (Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition) System Operator/Administrator assists in managing remote control system that monitors irrigation systems timings depending upon factors like humidity & rain forecasts.

6.Research Scientist/Researcher who can work on subjects related with  Smart farming tools automation processes development
\

7.Crop Monitoring And Analysis Application Expertto identify problems in crops ,diseases using digital imaging & satellite imagery-identify pests,disease at early stage 

8.Environmental Systems Designer who can innovate methodsfor sustainable smart environment friendly solutions integrating electronics,internet&biotechnology related fields

9.Agriculture Technicain/Agronomist consultant  which advises purchasing electronic pest repellant devices,new hybrid seed varieties considering soil,mineralogyanalysis etc . It will supervise pesticide recommendations ,water availability utilization-assists farmer for implementation strategy,scheduling,future planning,machinery installation etc
